# Lecture

## Learning objectives

::: callout-note
### Learning objectives

**At the end of class you will be able to:**

-   Generate and navigate a quarto document
-   Understand what packages are and how to use them
-   Get data in and out of R
-   Recognize and create various data types in R
:::
